title: Triallion Gaming Network - Perfect World 1.5.1
description:
Triallion Gaming Network presents to you our new Perfect World 1.5.1 private server. Created for those that enjoy the journey of getting to the end. 

The game has a very standard set up much like the original, 6 races to choose from, 10 classes, open world map for world PvP (Should you choose to go PvP mode).

Mounts and flights have been given a boost in speed nerfing of drops, exp, sp and gold when you out level mobs has been eliminated meaning you can help your friends farm low level gears in dungeons. 

Team exp has also been boosted so doing quests, grinding or dungeon leveling with friends is much more worthwhile.

A PvE server that is designed to encourage team play, join us today. Our torrent file is well seeded so you will get maximum speed possible when you download.

or visit our web page at triallion.co.uk
